sense.name: Present to or give to as a gift.
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] BESTOW NP2[patient] (PP{P NP[recipient]})
sense.examples: The university bestowed a degree on its most famous former student, who never graduated. We bestow this honor on you, Louisa. The award is bestowed upon the bravest soldier in a given conflict. The rank was bestowed on him by his commanding officer.

sense.name: Cause to have a certain quality.
sense.examples: Her presence bestows a certain cachet on the company. The music bestowed an aire of elegance to the play. This bestows a light note.
